text: Hubl is something you can learn as you need it or you can spend time reading through the documentation and then know later on when you can use it.  A good place to start is here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/syntax>

If you come from a background of web development in other languages/frameworks, this is very similar to a templating language. HUBL allows us to use some "backend" items and bring them into a template. There are also some filters and functions that allow you to bring in content, to change content and to vastly alter content.
If you have specific questions if you are trying to do something, ask in here and you should get an answer in a few hours
